var restaurantsListReducer=function restaurantsListReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{restaurants:[]};var RESTAURANT_LIST_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,restaurants:action.payload};case RESTAURANT_LIST_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};export var
